Your Neighborhood
Liquor Store

Located in the heart of Murfreesboro, we're proud to serve our community with an exceptional selection of wines, spirits, beers, and cigars. Whether you're looking for everyday favorites or rare finds, our knowledgeable staff is here to help you discover the perfect bottle.

Common Questions

Frequently Asked Questions

Find answers to common questions about Liquor & Wine Outlet

We're open Monday through Saturday from 8:00 AM to 11:00 PM, and Sunday from 10:00 AM to 11:00 PM. We're located at 2003 SE Broad Street, Murfreesboro, TN 37130. For any special requests, feel free to call us at (615) 624-6928.

Yes! We offer delivery through DoorDash and Uber Eats. You can browse our selection and place orders directly through either platform. We also offer in-store pickup for large orders. Call us at (615) 624-6928 for inquiries about orders over 10 items.

Liquor & Wine Outlet stands out with our exceptional selection of wines, spirits, beers, and cigars. Our knowledgeable staff is passionate about helping you find the perfect bottle for any occasion. We source rare and hard-to-find items, offer competitive prices, and provide personalized recommendations. As a locally-owned business, we're committed to serving the Murfreesboro community with excellence.

Absolutely! Our expert staff specializes in helping customers discover their next favorite drink. Whether you're looking for a specific wine vintage, a rare bourbon, or something new to try, we can help. If we don't have it in stock, we can often special order it for you. Visit us in person or call (615) 624-6928 to speak with our knowledgeable team.

Yes! We love helping customers find the perfect selection for any occasion. Whether you need wine for a dinner party, spirits for a celebration, craft beer for a casual gathering, or premium cigars for a special event, our team can provide personalized recommendations. Visit us at 2003 SE Broad Street or call (615) 624-6928 to discuss your needs.
